hero.title: Camilo Cruz
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: I am a FullStack developer with a passion for building robust and scalable solutions, specializing in administration and logistics systems.

projectsPage.title: My Projects
projectsPage.subtitle: A selection of projects that showcase my skills.

projects.title: LogicSmart
projects.description: Full application that allows distribution companies to optimize their operations through microservices for user management, orders, inventory, geolocation, and deliveries reports.

projects.title: Store Management App
projects.description: A full application that allows store owners to manage their inventory, orders, customers, and sales. It also provides a dashboard for analytics and reporting.

projects.title: Mortuary Website
projects.description: A full website that allows mortuary owners to manage their inventory, roles, and users. It also includes a full authentication system with JWT tokens and role-based access control.
